feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.128
entry.content:
Release notes

  • Bug fixes & performance improvements

Changelog

  • [mob][photos] Fix issues with face thumbnail by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1523
  • [mob][photos] Generate face crops faster by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1542
  • [mob][photos] Remove unnecessary optional parameter by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1543
  • [FEAT] Resumable Multipart Upload by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1406
  • [mob] Keep fetching embeddings till no embedding is returned by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1709
  • Revert "Move padding within to increase tap-able area" by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1712
  • [mob][photos] Bump up to v0.8.95 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1722
  • [mob] Minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1724
  • Fix failing workflow for photos internal release by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1723
  • [mob] Show progress for downloading of clip models by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1738
  • Mobile faces v0 by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1776
  • [mob] Fix bug during logout by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1800
  • Mobile face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1799
  • Ml fixes by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1812
  • [mob][photos] Small fix in index scheduling by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1813
  • [mob][photos] Bump by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1814
  • Face flag by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1818
  • [mob][photos] Bump by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1819
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1788
  • Upgrade to flutter 3.22.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1804
  • Face fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1823
  • [mob][photos] Use flutter 3.22 for internal build by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1824
  • Dart UI isolate fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1828
  • Dart UI isolate fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1829
  • [mob][photos] Fix infinite loading on searching by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1830
  • Face small improvements by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1839
  • Face wake by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1843
  • [mob] Use custom assetPickerTextDelegate to use en as default by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1844
  • [mob] Increase limit to 50 for adding asset from device by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1873
  • [mob][photos] Trigger send logs if app is stuck in spalsh screen for >= 15 seconds by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1796
  • Face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1885
  • Wrap add person name banner inside safeArea by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1887
  • [mob][photos] Fetch remote feedback before clustering by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1888
  • [mob][photos] Bump by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1889
  • [mob][photos] Migrate files db to sqlite async by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1802
  • [mob] Minor fixes in face by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1900
  • Revert "Upgrade to flutter 3.22.0 (#1804)" by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1901
  • [mob] Lint fix by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1902
  • [mob] Use same flutter version in all workflows by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1903
  • Tiny face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1906
  • Breakup cluster by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1917
  • [mob] Hide faceItemWidget from fileInfo if faceIndexing is disabled by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1918
  • [mob] Remove dead code by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1919
  • Last fixes by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1920
  • [mob][photos] Upgrade to flutter 3.22.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1933
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1938
  • Final beta face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1944
  • [mob] Gracefully handle the case when app is stuck due to secureStore exception by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1916
  • Update mobile-release.yml by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1955
  • [photos] bump version 0.8.128+648 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1956

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.94...photos-v0.8.128

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.131
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Face improvements by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1988
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1983
  • [mob][photos] Bump up version + use latest flutter version (v3.22.1) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1993

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.128...photos-v0.8.131

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.0
entry.content:
Release notes

  • Video editor
  • Passkey support
  • Beautiful preview images for links
  • Ability to view large files
  • Stability improvements

What's Changed

  • [mob] Face cooldown by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2000
  • [mob] Group by size by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1886
  • Thumbnail duration by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2001
  • [mob][gallery] Refactor grouping to enable week/month/year wise groups by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1610
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2007
  • [photos] Bump version 0.8.132+652 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2008
  • [mob][photos] Fix: sharing to outside ente doesn't work on iPad by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2014
  • [photos][mob] Enhance quick links section UI/UX by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2019
  • Add more startup logs by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2028
  • [mob][photos] share with placeholder and changed share link button by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1969
  • Revert "[mob][photos] Fix BG task not getting killed" by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2034
  • [photos] Hide Archived collections from on Ente section by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2045
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2040
  • [photos] Enable l10n for Russian, Turkish, & Portuguese(Brazilian) by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2051
  • [docs] Add sharable URL configuration by @xqus in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2048
  • Upgrade to flutter 3.22.2 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2076
  • [mob][photos] Modify the code to use XFile.fromData(bytes) instead of saving the image to a file for share link placeholder by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2073
  • Increase grace period of Stripe subscriptions to 14 days by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2096
  • [mob][photos] Mention OS with subject of logs sent when app is stuck on lockscreen for more than 15 seconds. This will let us identify OS when logs are not attached by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2077
  • [mobile] Update passkeys URLs by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2101
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2089
  • [mob][photos] Discovery (behind feature flag) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2115
  • [mob][photos] Bump up to v0.8.137 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2119
  • [Mobile] Add Video Editor by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1748
  • [mob][photos] Remove internal user flag by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2120
  • [mob] Passkeys: Don't show recover option on accounts page by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2122
  • [Passkey] Add check status option + other fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2123
  • Change log by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2131
  • [mob][auth] Fix handling of passkey when email verification is turned on by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2137
  • [photos] Bump version v0.9.0 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2140
  • [photos] Update bundle name from ente Photos -> Ente Photos by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2141

New Contributors

  • @AmanRajSinghMourya made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1969
  • @ecoholic84 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2036
  • @atyabbin made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2015
  • @xqus made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2048

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.131...photos-v0.9.0

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ente -> Ente by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2151
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2184
  • [mob][fix] Hide archived items from memories by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2201
  • Date picker l10n by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2203
  • [Mob][Photos] Show video duration only on Gallery by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2205
  • [mob] Log suggestion errors by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2212
  • Remove feedback by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2223
  • [mob][photos] Select all from gallery (only available to internal users) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2217
  • [mob] Reduce error severity by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2224
  • Upgrade onnx dependency by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.0...photos-v0.9.2

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Error state for text input widget by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2139
  • Clip fix unusable formats by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2270
  • Face cleanup by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2273
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2278
  • [mob][photos] Cache results for Magic section (only visible to internal users) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2282
  • [mob][photos] Fix file bottom bar not disappearing when in fullscreen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2286
  • Face cooldown by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2300
  • [mob] Fix Send link option position for person and unamed group by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2313
  • [mob][photos] upgrade photo_manager by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2301
  • [mob][photos] Unselect all selected items on system back navigation by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2315
  • [mob][photos] Fix: Intermittent disappearance of favorite album on 'On Ente' section. by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2314
  • [mob][photos] Fix german translation by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2337
  • [mob] Avoid FileUploader cache clear in case of autoLogout by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2335
  • [mob][photos] Applock to set custom pin/password by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2130
  • [mob][photos] Added button to logout from Lockscreen by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.2...photos-v0.9.5
